articles.title: Famed Japanese restaurant Nobu coming to Singapore in May - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The celebrity favourite restaurant that combines Japanese cuisine with South American influences is set to launch at Four Seasons Hotel.
articles.content: Known as much for its celebrity clientele as its culinary offerings, famed Japanese restaurant Nobu is coming to Singapore very soon. The fine dining spot is set to launch at the Four Seasons Hotel i… [+1244 chars]

articles.title: Bipartisan bill banning Russian oil sets up clash with White House - POLITICO
articles.description: The White House said it does not “have a strategic interest in reducing the global supply of energy, and that would raise prices at the gas pump for the American people.”
articles.content: Manchin knocked the White House for opposing the halt on imports of Russian oil based on fears it would further raise pump prices. Crude oil prices touched their highest level since 2008 early on Thu… [+3035 chars]

articles.title: RT America Shuts Down, Lays Off Most of Its Staff - The Daily Beast
articles.description: The Russian government-controlled U.S. channel is no more as outrage grows over the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

articles.author: Joe Davies
articles.title: Study finds drinking with meals cuts risk of type 2 diabetes - Daily Mail
articles.description: The American study followed more than 300,000 people over 10 years. Previous research has suggested that polyphenols - a compound in the skin of grapes - can reduce blood sugar levels.
articles.content:
You shouldn't feel guilty for having a glass of wine every night so long as you drink it with dinner, like the French.
A study has found enjoying a glass with your meal, rather than on its own, coul… [+6133 chars]
